name: VoxPro Wave File
summary: Learn about .VPW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When you save your recordings in VoxPro, the default file type is VPW, which will create a VPW file. You can easily create a .WAV file from your VPW file by simply renaming the extension to WAV. It will not sound the same as your VPW file though, it will play the original audio then it will play any effects or audio pasted from other files.
NOTE: Audion Labs was acquired by Wheatstone Corporation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
